1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A single mother named Areum bumps into Seongun, the director of a fashion company on a plane flight to Seoul.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Areum lies to Seongun about her baby. Areum meets up with her Aunt Seonhwa.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Areum is allowed to enter the fashion show. Aunt Seonhwa discovers that Tiffany is Areum's baby.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Areum comes in first place at the fashion show but must leave early when she learns that Tiffany is in the hospital.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Tiffany is released from the hospital. Areum's mom pays a surprise visit to Seonhwa and Yeongsu.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Areum is appointed team leader of the Global K Fashion Project.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Myeonghwa takes Tiffany. Areum reveals to her mom and dad that she's in Korea.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Seongun warns his stepmom not to come to his mother's memorial service. Seongcheol offers his extra bedroom to Yeongsu and his family.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Areum gives a presentation on her market research. Aunt Seonhwa and family get invited over for dinner.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Areum's mom catches her nursing Tiffany and learns the truth.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Areum faints and misses her presentation. Myeonghwa continues to press Areum for details about the baby's father. Han Panseok is going to be named a ministerial candidate.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Myeonghwa wants to keep the truth from Areum's dad so she asks Aunt Seonhwa to keep up the charade. Areum revises and presents her second presentation with a little help.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Tiffany's father is in Korea and wants to win back Areum. Areum suggests the company invest in a children's line of clothing.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Areum and Director Cheon do some snooping around to check out their competition. Phillip tracks down the man he has seen with Areum.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Aunt Seonhwa gets a job and Areum and her mother worry about who will watch Tiffany. Areum presents her designs for the children's line. Han Panseok is named ministerial candidate.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Phillip is surprised to meet Director Cheon's fiancee. He asks to meet the project lead in his hotel and Director Cheon becomes very jealous. One more person inadvertently learns the truth about Tiffany.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Yeongsu asks Panseok to hire him and lets on that he is making sacrifices for Areum. Phillip decides to invest in Winners Group. Ms. Lee tells Attorney Ko why she picked her to be Seongun's wife.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Panseok learns the truth about Tiffany. Ms. Lee finally finds out who Areum is. Seongun can't stop thinking about Areum.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Areum is kicked out of her parent's house. Yuni catches Seongun flying his toy plane with Areum.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Philip decides to invest in Winners Group. The web of lies about Tiffany contines to unravel.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Han Panseok thinks he has made the right decision for the family. Areum presents the new clothing lines.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Areum, Seongun, Phillip, and Yuni have an awkward business lunch. Yeongsu gets an investment oppurtunity that he doesn't have the money for.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Areum and Ms. Lee finally meet. Panseok is becoming suspicious of the coincidences he has started to discover about Winners Group and his daughter. Yeongsu tells Myeonghwa about his foolproof investment opportunity.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Areum designs the suit and wedding dress for Seongun and Yuni's wedding. Seongun and Yuni go ring shopping.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Seongun no-shows his engagement ceremony. Yuni retaliates in anger by breaking his toy planes.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Ms. Lee tells Myeonghwa that Areum is seeing her son. Phillip begins to suspect that Areum's baby might be his.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Jinwo pleads with Areum to make up with their father. Seongho learns that his grandmother can't read.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Phillip learns that the baby's name is Tiffany and grows more certain that she is his daughter. Panseok's hearing begins.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Panseok makes a move to save Areum from public humiliation and forfeits his own career.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Areum tells Seongun the truth about Tiffany. She wants to tell everyone the truth, but her father is adamant that she keep the secret. Myeonghwa convinces Areum to bring the father home.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Areum tells Phillip that he is the father. Ms. Lee bribes Louis with a trip to Paris in exchange for making Areum miserable at work.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Seongun finds out that Areum has been relegated to the warehouse. Bae Cheolgu moves in with Seongcheol.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Yuni and Ms. Lee plot to remove Areum from Winner's Group. Areum's family meet Phillip face to face for the first time.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Now that Areum is working as an intern, the design team needs to hire another member. Yuni begins to feel bad about how Areum is being treated.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Director Cheon finds out that Areum wrote the marketing report. Louis has an uncomfortable meeting with Ms. Lee and has to tell her that Areum is back with the design team.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Yuni finds out that Phillip and Areum have a relationship. Phillip wants to take Areum to Milan to finish her studies but has to figure out what to do with Tiffany.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Uncle Yeongsu finds out he's been scammed. Seongun and Phillip find out they've both been pining after Areum.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Phillip tells Seongun that he is going to marry Areum. Yuni confronts Areum about dating two men at once.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Phillip proposes to Areum. Seongun tells Yuni how he feels about her.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Yuni tells Seongun that she still plans to marry him. Panseok donates a large sum of money anonymously to fund a children's library.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Phillip's ex-wife shows up at his hotel unexpectedly. Yuni continues to plan her wedding to Seongun. Seongun learns about Phillip's past.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Areum and Lee Suji meet and Areum learns the timeline of Suji's relationship with Phillip. Seonhwa learns about her husband's latest investment failure.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Areum discovers Phillip's paternity test. Phillip buys Areum's family a new car.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: President Cheon suggests Seongun's wedding be postponed. Seongun and Phillip confront each other.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Areum reveals to her parents that she has decided not to marry Phillip. Yuni and Ms. Lee find out President Cheon's plans to call off Seongun's wedding.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Areum tells the world that Tiffany is her baby and not her father's illegitimate child. Areum tells Seongun her true feelings.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: The board wants Areum to be in charge of the new children's clothing line because young mothers now look up to her. Phillip goes out of his way to sabotage Winners.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Yuni tries to frame Areum. Seongun declares his feelings for Areum despite his father's disapproval.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Winner's Group gets chosen for the K-Project. Ms. Lee confronts Areum and her mom about Seongun. Areum's dad find's out about the Riverside City scam.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Seongun takes Areum out for a surprise dinner. Areum's fashion line for children gets a brand name. Phillip enlists Yuni's help.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Areum explains to Seongun why she broke things off with Phillip. Phillip gives money to Aunt Seonhwa. Copies of Areum's clothing line start showing up all over Dongdaemun.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: President Cheon finds out about the design leak. Seongun helps Areum buy up all pieces that are on sale. Areum tries to clear her name.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Areum finds the subway surveillance footage of the USB drive being delivered. Yuni introduces Phillip to Ms. Lee. The plot to take down Seongun thickens.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Phillip shows up at Winners to save the day. Myeonghwa is still trying to get Phillip and Areum together. Myeonghwa realizes she has become extremely forgetful recently.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Seongun is stonewalled at every turn by Phillip during his Chinese Market and Global Sourcing presentation. Phillip reveals to President Cheon that he is Tiffany's father. Areum's brother gives her good advice.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Phillip forces Areum to work in his office as his secretary. Seongun seeks investment partners for his own company. Areum starts secret design work in the storage room. Myeonghwa's gets back her test results for dementia.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Seongun reveals Phillip's ill intentions toward Winner's Group to his father. Areum discovers Ha Yunsu's suspect file in Yuni's office. Yuni locks Areum in the storage room.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Areum tries to find out how she got locked in the storage room. Seongun tracks down a lead about why Attorney Seo suddenly quit.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Seongun tries to make the best of his suspension and starts working in the warehouse. Yuni sees Seongun and Areum enjoying lunch.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Areum shows Seongun the email she found in Phillip's inbox. Tiffany's visit with her father is cut short.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Phillip tells President Cheon he wants to send Seongun to oversee the factory in China. Seongun and his father have a major blowout.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Myeonghwa's memory is getting worse and she cannot remember what happened to Tiffany. Phillip pushes for more changes at Winners.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Seongun celebrates his birthday with Areum and Tiffany. Myeonghwa requests a divorce from Areum's father. Areum discovers the partnership contract between Shuwei and Winner's Group in Phillip's car.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Myeonghwa tells Areum that she can't take care of Tiffany anymore. Seongun is worried about his father's health. Panseok realizes there is something wrong with Myeonghwa.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Phillip confronts Seongun. Panseok talks to Myeonghwa about her illness.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Areum and Seongun visit Attorney Seo's mom's funeral in hopes of finding out the purpose of the contract change. Phillip frames President Cheon for embezzling funds. President Cheon is arrested.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Ms. Lee is named temporary CEO of Winners. Phillip offers Seongun a chance to save his father. Yuni loses it in front of Areum.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Areum makes a deal with Phillip. Seongcheol finds Yujin's picture. Panseok tries to make Myeonghwa happy.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Areum gives Yuni the files to give to Seongun. Yuni leaves Winners. Seongun pays a visit to the vacation house.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: Ms. Lee forces a car crash and ends up in the hospital. President Cheon returns to Winner's Group. Ms. Lee and Yuni get into a fight.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: Ms. Lee begs President Cheon and Seongun for forgiveness. Areum tells her parents that she is back with Phillip and that they will go to the States next month. Seongcheol and Yujin have a long overdue conversation.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Jinwu has trouble accepting his mother's illness. Phillip parades Areum in front of Seongun. Seongun gets a lead on the transfer of funds.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Seongun meets Lee Suji. President Cheon is slowly getting back at Ms. Lee. Seongun confronts Areum about her choice.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Areum sees the extent of her mother's illness. Phillip gets nervous. Cheolgu takes Yujin for a prenatal exam. Seonhwa and Ms. Lee meet unexpectedly in the local spa.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Seongun confronts Phillip with his evidence. Jinwu tells Jiwu about his mother. Phillip is in trouble. President Cheon and Panseok share information about Phillip.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Phillip tells Seongun that he can have Areum. Ms. Lee allows Seongho to go to Hyeokmin's house to study. Phillip tries to figure out how to get custody of Tiffany.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Seongun and Phillip run into each other at Areum's house. President Cheon reveals plans for his will. Jinwu plays the guitar and sings for his parents.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: Areum, Seongun, and Han Panseok are furious to find Myeonghwa at Phillip's apartment. Jiwu sets Seongun and Areum up on a surprise lunch date.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Myeonghwa and Areum attend a therapy session at the hospital. President Cheon finalizes the changes in his will. Phillip's father arrives in Korea.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: Suji brings Phillip's father to Korea. He wants Phillip and Suji to get back together and raise Tiffany. Seongcheol pressures Cheolgu to start making money.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Phillip and Suji plot to get Tiffany. Seonhwa tells her family about Myeonghwa.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Areum tries to convince Phillip to give Tiffany back. Seongho worries that his grandmother might have dementia.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Areum and Phillip speak to their respective lawyers about custody rights over Tiffany. Han Panseok meets with Phillip's father. Seongun wants to marry Areum.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Myeonghwa has a lucid day and the kids are convinced that she is getting better. Cheolgu tells Seongcheol he wants to make Haebang a professional singer. Areum gets to see Tiffany.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Seongun wants to help create a stable home for Tiffany so he asks Panseok for his permission and his help.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: Phillip's father tries to convince Areum to just give Tiffany up. Haebang has trouble dealing with Seongcheol's rejection. Areum tries appealing to Suji to get Tiffany back.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: Areum asks Aunt Seonhwa and family to move in with her parents. Suji reveals that she can't have children of her own. Phillip, his father, Suji and Tiffany get family portraits taken.

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: Seongun and Areum get Tiffany back. Areum and family take Myeonghwa to the park to jog her memory. Yunjeong revals that she was paid to pose as Myeonghwa's friend from high school.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: President Cheon gives Areum an ultimatum: give up Tiffany or give up Seongun. Myeonghwa realizes that she was responsible for losing Tiffany.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: Phillip tries to get President Cheon to force Areum and Seongun to sign away custody rights. Haebang prepares to move out so she can move in with Seongcheol.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: Seongun promises his father that he will not get married without his permission. Myeonghwa asks to see Phillip. Nurse Min bumps into Ms. Lee at the salon.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Phillip's father's health is deteriorating fast and he wants Phillip and Suji to take Tiffany to the States before he dies. Seonhwa, Yeongsu, and Hyeokmin move in with Areum's parents. Nurse Min threatens to blackmail Ms. Lee.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Tiffany is rushed to the hospital with liver complications. The doctors' reveal that she will need a liver transplant. Phillip uses Tiffany's health issues as an excuse to accuse Areum of poor parenting.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: Areum and her family get tested to see if they are a match to donate their liver. Suji is concerned that a sick child might be a big hassle.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: The family is not a suitable match for donation. President Cheon tasks Jang as a double agent. Phillip gets tested.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Phillip is a match as Tiffany's liver donor but at a risk to his own health. Suji and Phillip's father adamantly oppose the surgery. Seongun and Areum meet with a shady donor.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Nurse Min wants more money. Myeonghwa pleads with Phillip to have the surgery. Areum learns that Phillip is leaving for the States. Hiden wants to cancel the partnership agreement.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Areum has to make an impossible choice. Tiffany is put on a respirator.

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: The family waits anxiously at the hospital. Ms. Lee worries about Nurse Min. The family finds out about Areum's deal with Phillip. Haebang's CD comes out.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Seongun and Ms. Lee meet. Seongcheol realizes his feelings for Haebang. Phillip has trouble recovering from surgery.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Phillip wakes up. Haebang confronts President Cheong about Seongun's mistreatment of Sua. President Cheon shows Seongun his mother's will.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Phillip has a change of heart. President Cheong gets more disturbing news than he can handle in one afternoon. Haebang's album is a hit.

imdb.title: Sweet Secrets
plot: Sung-Woon is the self-centered director of a fashion company. After falling in love with a goodhearted single-mother, Sung-Woon reevaluates his priorities in life.
